text:
I wanted to create a ticket in HubSpot whenever a new message is posted in Slack. I've successfully set up this automation using Zapier. However, I'm facing a challenge in adding the associated contact and company to these tickets. The issue arises because Zapier doesn't provide a direct option to identify the key contact and email details from the Slack message.
My question is: How can I associate the correct contacts and companies with these tickets when they are created?
